import React, { Component } from 'react' import { PageHeader, Button, Table, Modal, Space, Form, Input, Col, Row, Radio } from 'antd' const columns = [ { title: '编号', dataIndex: 'carriageNumber', key: '1', align: 'center', }, { title: '级别', dataIndex: 'level', key: '2', align: 'center', }, { title: '规格', dataIndex: 'size', key: '3', align: 'center', }, { title: '座位数', key: '4', dataIndex: 'seatNumber', align: 'center', }, { title: '价格基数', key: '5', dataIndex: 'priceBase', align: 'center', }, { title: '适配车型', key: '6', dataIndex: 'adapter', align: 'center', }, { title: '操作', key: '7', render: () => ( 编辑 删除 ), align: 'center' }, ]; const data = [ { key: '1', carriageNumber: '001', level: '豪华', size: '(4+4)*10', seatNumber: '20', priceBase: '8', adapter: '动车', }, ]; export default class Carriage extends Component { state = { visible: false, } // 打开模态窗口 showModal = () => { this.setState({ visible: true }) } // 处理点击确定 handleOk = () => { this.setState({ visible: false }) } // 处理点击取消 handleCancel = () => { this.setState({ visible: false }) } // 处理点击取消 onClose = () => { this.setState({ visible: false }) } addSite=()=>{ this.setState({visible:false}) } getSizeLeft = (value) => { console.log(value) } // 输入完规格计算座位数 countSeat = () => { } render() { return (
车厢管理} subTitle={} />
0 豪华 普通 经济 动车 特快 动车、特快
) } }
